sinks.name: TEE_Free
sinks.reason: Missing input validation allows tainted pointers to cause undefined behavior or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Output buffer could be shared with Normal World

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be tainted, leading to buffer overflow

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Tainted size parameter could lead to memory allocation issues, such as buffer overflows or out-of-bounds access.
